articles.author: Phil Medlicott
articles.title: Five-star England thump reigning champions Netherlands to continue Euro 2022 warm-up in style
articles.description: England 5-1 Netherlands: The Lionesses ran rampant at Elland Road as Lucy Bronze, Beth Mead (2), Ella Toone and Lauren Hemp all scored
articles.content: England Women delivered a significant statement ahead of next months home European Championship as they came from behind to thrash reigning champions Netherlands 5-1 at Elland Road in their penultima… [+3546 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Woodcock
articles.title: Tory support for Boris Johnson ebbing after disastrous by-election defeats
articles.description: Party chairman quits and former leader calls on PM to go as Labour and Lib Dems claim scalps in red wall and Tory heartland
articles.content: Boris Johnsons hold on the premiership is tonight in peril, amid signs that support for his leadership within the Conservative Party is ebbing away in the wake of a pair of disastrous by-election def… [+7274 chars]

articles.author: Graig Graziosi
articles.title: Roe v Wade overturned latest: Biden condemns ‘sad day’ for US, as AOC joins pro-choice protests
articles.description: Without Roe v Wade, approximately half of US women will be stripped of their right to choose
articles.content: Roe v Wade has been overturned by the US Supreme Court. Joe Biden addressed the nation hours after the ruling, telling Americans to vote in lawmakers who will codify Roe v Wade into law and calling f… [+6347 chars]

articles.author: Katie Edwards
articles.title: Roe v Wade overturned isn’t a victory for life – it spells death for women
articles.description: Our lives and health are collateral damage. Unnecessary maternal mortality seems to be the order of the day in the US Supreme Court
articles.content:
We saw it coming at us like a 10 tonne truck but, if anyone needed confirmation, here it is: the bodily autonomy of women is under a deadly assault. Think thats hyperbole? Think again.
In a sucker p… [+3862 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Griffin
articles.title: Netflix is definitely getting ads, company announces
articles.description: Reversal of policy comes as Netflix starts to rapidly lose users
articles.content:
Netflix is definitely putting ads into its service, it has announced.
The company had always said it strongly believed in leaving marketing out of the streaming platform, and has never shown ads dur… [+1383 chars]

articles.title: Wakefield voters chose Labour – the Tories should be honest about why
articles.description: The problem is Boris Johnson and 12 years of failure. It wasn’t some non-existent pact between Labour and the Lib Dems

articles.author: Andrew Grice
articles.title: Oliver Dowden’s resignation is worse news for Boris Johnson than the double by-election defeat
articles.description: There is little confidence in Toryland that Johnson can recover; his departure looks only a matter of time, writes Andrew Grice
articles.content: The resignation of Oliver Dowden as Conservative Party chair is more significant than the partys double defeat in Thursdays by-elections in Tiverton and Honiton and Wakefield. It matters because some… [+829 chars]

articles.author: Helen Coffey
articles.title: World’s biggest cruise ship sent to scrapyard before ever setting sail
articles.description: The 9,000-passenger vessel will be torn up for parts
articles.content:
What was set to be the worlds largest cruise ship by passenger capacity is being sent to the scrapyard - before it ever had a chance to set sail.
The 9,000-passenger, 20-deck vessel, Global Dream II… [+1407 chars]

articles.title: Former Wimbledon finalist sexually harassed ‘at least 30 times’ by WTA staff member
articles.description: Andrea Jaeger, a rising tennis star in the early 1980s, says she was threatened after making a complaint
articles.content:
Former Wimbledon finalist Andrea Jaeger says she was sexually harassed at least 30 times in the womens locker room during her career by a WTA staff member.
